data.title: 以 3 到 5 分钟描写以下主题
data.content: What characteristics do you think makes a person worthy of your trust? Explain your reasoning.
data.answer: A person needs to be honest to be able to gain my trust. For example, an honest person tends not to lie and if this person faces a dilemma and there will be a higher chance for her to decide to tell the truth or do the right thing, instead of acting in her own best interest. Therefore, it is easier for an honest person to gain my trust.
